mapper.select: SELECT videoList.`videoID`, `videoTitle`, `videoDesc`, `videoDate`, VIDEO.`username`, `uploadFileName`, listInfo.`listID`, `listName` FROM VIDEO, listInfo, videoList WHERE videoList.`listID` = listInfo.`listID` AND VIDEO.`videoID` = videoList.`videoID` AND listInfo.`listID` IN (SELECT videoList.`listID` FROM videoList, listInfo WHERE videoList.`listID` = listInfo.`listID` AND videoList.`videoID` = #{videoID})
SELECT `videoID`, `videoTitle`, `videoDesc`, `videoDate`, VIDEO.`username`, `uploadFileName` FROM VIDEO WHERE `username` IN (SELECT `username` FROM VIDEO WHERE videoID= #{videoID})
